Package mapr.master

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileInfo
    Encapsulates all metadata (excluding name) of a file on DFS, including its replica locations, partitioning rules, etc.
    HostPort
    Encapsulates a (hostname, portnum) pair for any component of MapReduce framework.
    IDAssigner
    Global JobID / TaskID manager, where a unique, thread-safe ID can be obtained for each new Job or new Task.
    JobInfo
    Encapsulates all metadata of a Job from MapReduce user, including input-/output-file, command-line argument, job status, JobID, etc.
    MasterCoordinator
    Main class containing all properties that the Master node in a MapReduce class keep track of.
    MasterCoordinatorCheckFailure
    Background utility that checks for the health of cluster machines.
    MasterCoordinatorLaunchTasks
    Background utility that dispatches tasks across MapReduce cluster.
    MasterCoordinatorServeConnection
    Runnable class that handles all connection requests to Master node.
    MasterCoordinatorStartup
    Runnable class with the entry point for the Master node in MapReduce cluster.
    QueuedTasks
    Encapsulates the pending and queued tasks of a worker node.
    RunningTasks
    Keeps track of all running Mapper, Sorter, and Reducers of a worker node.
    TaskInfo
    Encapsulates all metadata for a task, including Task ID, Task Type, I/O File Name, etc.
    Timer
    Timeout object for MapReduce framework.
